text:
This bus stop is sheltered, if you walk around 400m against the flow, you will reach some eateries.

I always wonder why people would transfer bus or even drop off at bus stop that seems to serve no building. Perhaps this is the nearest to the nearby school.

Or maybe this is a shorter walk to the neighbouring condos compared to the next bus stop at the MRT station.
The place has a chill vibe, great for walks and workouts.
